attributes.action: Get the part's act together to stop the rise in the far right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This goes to all mp's and party members in the labour party, including the ones that have resigned to smoke screen their own faults can you stop in fighting and get back to talking to the people as the rise in fascism is close. Its the same history as the rise in Nazism when the middle classes started losing money and possessions, the people that gain popularity are fascist stop it now.

rejection.details: As a Government website, we cannot publish party political material. We suggest you contact the Labour Party directly with your concerns.
